short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide images and View hidden content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension has the function to help customize the website view content.
- Ability to hide and show images on the content to help readers see the text in a focused way.
- Ability to show hidden texts or hide them at will on website.
Website Custom BDay - Custom Birthday Shirts For Family, Toddlers & Kids, Boys, Girls, Women's, Men's.
